Here is a cool shot of me playing a show at The Concert Pub with a broken arm.


[img:3crwqy39]http://i66.photobucket.com/albums/h245/drfroth/80sHBoct5sams314.jpg[/img:3crwqy39]


Thankfully the cast is now off so things are getting a little easier (I do have a steel plate in there now, so it is not all ducks and checkers... but I'm managing.)

Thought you guys might like it.

Dr. Froth
